title: Enhanced Test Story
description: As a developer, I want to test the enhanced JSON schema so that I can validate the complete structure works correctly.
iWant: to test the enhanced JSON schema
soThat: I can validate the complete structure works correctly
acceptanceCriteria: Given a complete JSON schema, when validated against the structure, then all required fields are present
Given proper data types, when submitted to the API, then validation passes successfully
Given array constraints, when acceptance criteria are provided, then minItems and maxItems are respected
